definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="block_remove_with_particles"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">CUSTOM:TheDemonLord</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment h="52" pinned="false" w="289">This gets the coordinates of the provided entity, then prints the coordinates in the action bar.</comment><value name="text"><block inline="true" type="text_join"><mutation items="1"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The Demonic Lord has been summoned!</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
